channel.title: Comments on: Get set, go! Coffee stand construction starting…

item.title: By: Kirk Hudson
item.dc:creator: Kirk Hudson
item.description: That's the creative thinking and problem solving we've grown to expect from library staff. Good luck with that personal fundraising campaign.
item.content:encoded: That’s the creative thinking and problem solving we’ve grown to expect from library staff. Good luck with that personal fundraising campaign.

item.title: By: Margaret Hughes
item.dc:creator: Margaret Hughes
item.description: I'm going to have to start a Kickstarter campaign to fund all the almond milk lattes.
item.content:encoded: I’m going to have to start a Kickstarter campaign to fund all the almond milk lattes.

item.title: By: Kirk Hudson
item.dc:creator: Kirk Hudson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/11/14/get-set-go-coffee-stand-construction-starting/#comment-372">Julia Kochi</a>.
Come to the Library staff meeting on December 1 to hear more about the products available at Caffe Central.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Julia Kochi.

Come to the Library staff meeting on December 1 to hear more about the products available at Caffe Central.

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: More importantly (to me!) is what type of baked good will they be offering?
item.content:encoded: More importantly (to me!) is what type of baked good will they be offering?

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: I don't think she'd wait for a pour over either ;)
item.content:encoded: I don’t think she’d wait for a pour over either ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Kirk Hudson
item.dc:creator: Kirk Hudson
item.description: Hmm Michele, 'Betty' Bacall would appreciate the 'deep brewed flavah' of Blue Bottle, but I think she would object to the caffeine.
item.content:encoded: Hmm Michele, ‘Betty’ Bacall would appreciate the ‘deep brewed flavah’ of Blue Bottle, but I think she would object to the caffeine.

item.title: By: Kirk Hudson
item.dc:creator: Kirk Hudson
item.description: Wow, 5 comments (public and private) about the brand of coffee. Yes, hand crafted drip coffee from Blue Bottle will be served!
item.content:encoded: Wow, 5 comments (public and private) about the brand of coffee. Yes, hand crafted drip coffee from Blue Bottle will be served!

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: But would Lauren Bacall like it? http://youtu.be/LvCeIXnJv-w
item.content:encoded: But would Lauren Bacall like it? http://youtu.be/LvCeIXnJv-w

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/11/14/get-set-go-coffee-stand-construction-starting/#comment-361">Richard Trott</a>.
Don't play with my emotions, Kirk. Is Blue Bottle real?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Richard Trott.

Don’t play with my emotions, Kirk. Is Blue Bottle real?

item.title: By: Jason Hedrick
item.dc:creator: Jason Hedrick
item.description: Awesome news! I will definitely consider stopping by!
item.content:encoded: Awesome news! I will definitely consider stopping by!
